structure.unit: TITLE TO PROPERTY AND RESTRICTIONS ON USE, OWNERSHIP, AND ALIENATION

law.catch_line: Purposes and policies of KRS 381.9101 to 381.9207 -- Kentucky Condominium Act to be liberally construed.

text.section: KRS 381.9101 to 381.9207 shall be liberally construed and applied to promote its underlying purposes and policies.

The underlying purposes and policies of KRS 381.9101 to 381.9207 are:
To simplify, clarify, and modernize the law governing condominiums; and
To make uniform the law among the various jurisdictions.

law.history: Created 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 97, sec. 10, effective January 1, 2011.
